message: Validates passwords with at least one digit, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and a minimum length of 8 characters.
Validates first names containing only alphabetic characters.
Validates last names containing only alphabetic characters.
Validates phone numbers in various formats.
Validates addresses containing alphanumeric characters, spaces, periods, commas, and hash symbols.
Validates website URLs with HTTP or HTTPS protocols.
Validates dates in the MM/DD/YYYY format.
Validates usernames with alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, with a minimum length of 4 and a maximum length of 16 characters.
Validates social security numbers in the XXX-XX-XXXX format.
Validates credit card numbers using various card types.
Validates CVV (Card Verification Value) codes with a length of 3 or 4 digits.
Validates IP addresses in the standard dotted-decimal notation.
Validates MAC addresses in the standard colon-separated hexadecimal notation.
